answers.answer: :( I hope not. I mean I feel fine. I hardly ever get sick so when I do, its BAD.

Ive kind of went google crazy, and worried myself silly too. I read it could be all sorts of things, from infection to pre eclampsia. My feet have been semi swollen. Does urine look cloudy when there is protein in it?
I would give you OB a call. They will be able to tell you if it's something to worry about ex: preeclampsia. If they think it's something serious they will have you come in. Best of luck!
Yeah, I suppose ill give them a call. Theyre really horrible with getting back go you and my appt is Thursday. Hopefully its not anything serious. Thanks!
If your urine is cloudy you could possibly have a uti. Ask your doctor to do a urinalysis.

question: 18 weeks ladies. 3rd baby. Since yesterday morning I have been getting the chills. Every 20 mins or so i keep shaking for about 2 seconds each time. I feel like this isnt normal? Its hinestly kinda freaking me out because idk if my body is telling me something is weong. Ive heard of pregnancy hormones and all messing with temperature fluctuations causing chills but idk if this often for an extended time is normal? Please comment if any advice or input!
title: EXCESSIVE CHILLS?!
